H0.text: In the novel Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde , what is Dr Jekyll's first name . Edward

H1.text: In the novel Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde , what is Dr Jekyll's first name . Sebastian

H2.text: In the novel Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde , what is Dr Jekyll's first name . Silas

H3.text: In the novel Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde , what is Dr Jekyll's first name . HENRY

A4.text: Based in Soho in London's West End, Dr Jekyll is a 'large, well-made, smooth-faced man of fifty with something of a slyish cast', who sometimes feels he is battling between the good and evil within himself, leading to the struggle between his dual personalities of Henry Jekyll and Edward Hyde.

A5.text: The novella follows Gabriel John Utterson, a London-based legal practitioner who investigates a series of strange occurrences between his old friend, Dr. Henry Jekyll, and a murderous criminal named Edward Hyde.
